HomeFAQs.question: Can I participate individually in any event ?
HomeFAQs.answer: There are some events in which individual participation is allowed. You can refer to the rulebook present under every event on the website.

HomeFAQs.question: What are the fees for the events?
HomeFAQs.answer: There are no individual registration fees for the events.If you wish to participate in an event you have to purchase a pass. This pass excludes DJ night and workshops. https://anantagsfcu.in/buypass to buy a pass.

HomeFAQs.question: What if I pay the fees and I don't get the confirmation mail/SMS from your side?
HomeFAQs.answer: Just write to us at ananta@gsfcuniversity.ac.in and we shall provide you with the receipt for successful payments.

HomeFAQs.question: Will I get a refund?
HomeFAQs.answer: The pass fees are non-refundable and non-transferable in any case.You can review the refund policy page.
